# Data Cleaning  

```{r}
files <- list.files("data/GOToutput")

corpus <- data.frame(tweet_id = numeric(), text = character(), username = character(), user_id = numeric(), date = character(), query = character())

for (f in files) {
  df <- read.table(
    paste0("data/GOToutput/",f),
    sep="\t",
    header=TRUE
  )
  df$query = f
  corpus <- rbind(corpus,df)
}


df < read.delim(
    "data/GOToutput/#aGreekment_2015-07-01_2015-08-25.txt",
    sep="\t",
    quote="",
    comment.char=""
)

df < scan(
    "data/GOToutput/varoufakis_2015-07-01_2015-08-25.txt",""
)



```
